text: I have a repeatable rich text that is supposed to be like chapters, I want to name each chapter after it's number (chapter 1, chapter 2, chapter 3) automatically when adding a new one. Right now i used loop.index and every chapter gets the same count of how many chapters there are (chapter 123)  not quite what I wanted to do :sweat_smile:
Could you share the relevant code including the for loop?
I actually solved it myself! Thank you anyways :relaxed:

Hi! I created a search results page and all the info on the page is being searched and displayed. How do I define the search box to only search on page/blog titles and content. Not on menus or other different content on the site? Thanks
can you talk about your solution so that when someone finds this in search they have some more context?

<@U03H04WUZ41> Use follwing css classes from documentation:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/content-search>

to *exclude* from search:
```hs-search-hidden```
to *include* in search index:
```hs-search-keyword```
